Javascript Chat

A few things more...

Info

This is a side project that i build for my family to use as a home messenger. It allows users to connect to each other and communicate thanks to sockets. I used a very cool library called socket.io which allows real time communication between the browser and the server. At any point of the chat every user can see who is online at the moment as well as who is currently typing a message at the moment.

Build With: Javascript Socket.io HTML & W3.CSS
